item.title: Why I started this blog
item.description: As a first post, I chose to write about why I started this blog. This will help me come back to it and give me a reason to not give up. I have always felt the need to write about tech, to write about my discoveries as a software engineer. I want to share my findings and maybe discuss them with my fellow software development addicts. I love technology, it’s what I do for a living, it’s what I do on my free time.
